-- in --
| α |  β |
| - | -: |
| a |  1 |
| b | 20 |
-- markdown --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
α,β
a,1
b,20
-- in --
# My table

| α |  β |
| - | -: |
| a |  1 |
| b | 20 |
-- with extra md stuff blank line --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
α,β
a,1
b,20
-- in --
| `α` |  β |
| --- | -: |
| a   |  1 |
| b   | 20 |
-- with inline format --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
α,β
a,1
b,20
-- in --
| [α][Α] |  β |
| ------ | -: |
| a      |  1 |
| b      | 20 |
-- with inline links --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
[α][Α],β
a,1
b,20
-- in --
| α | β |
-- just header --
{"Markdown": true}
-- err --
could not find Markdown table
-- in --
| α |  β |
| a |  1 |
-- just header and row --
{"Markdown": true}
-- err --
could not find Markdown table
